course.title: CSI 1308 Introduction to Computing Concepts (3 units)
course.desc: Introduction to computer based problem solving for scientific applications. Design of algorithms and algorithms descriptions. 4th generation languages. Software packages. Structured program development. Modular and object-oriented programming. Program testing.Course Component: Laboratory, LecturePrerequisites: Advanced Functions and Introductory Calculus 4U and Geometry and Discrete Mathematics 4U. The courses ITI 1120, GNG 1106, CSI 1306, CSI 1308, CSI 1390 cannot be combined for units.
